I’m the author of many highly acclaimed travelogues and novels, including The
Great Railway Bazaar, The Mosquito Coast, On the Plain of Snakes, and Under the
Wave at Waimea
[https://www.hmhbooks.com/shop/books/Under-the-Wave-at-Waimea/9780358446286]. In
2015, I was awarded a Royal Medal from the…
nodes.title: I am Paul Theroux, travel writer and author of 56 books—AMA.
